The selection command, asks the engine to execute a selection.

selectionListener - Variable in class gui.GUI
The selection listener.
SelectionListener - Class in gui
SelectionListener is to listen on changes on the selection in the JTextArea, to ensure synchronization between selection in JTextArea and the selection object in the edition engine.
SelectionListener(EditionEngine, Recorder) - Constructor for class gui.SelectionListener
Constructor needs to know the edition engine to perform commands.
SelectRecordable - Class in recordables
SelectRecordable executes a select command will saving its state in a recorder.
SelectRecordable(EditionEngine, Recorder, Selection) - Constructor for class recordables.SelectRecordable
Instantiate a SelectRecordable from the given parameters (all shall be not null).
SelectRecordable(MementoCommand) - Constructor for class recordables.SelectRecordable
Instantiate a SelectRecordable from a memento and executes a select command.
